entry.value: // update app list if required if (data.update) Event_pageload_P0(ev);

validation.javaScript: var password = $("#rapid_P0_C231").val(); if (value != password && password != "********") return "Passwords must match";
var password = $("#rapid_P0_C843_").val(); if (value != password && password != "********") return "Passwords must match";

entry.value: // fake a click on the "Devices" tab $("#rapid_P0_C1192_").click(ev);

validation.message: Width must be a non-decimal number
Height must be a non-decimal number
Pixels per inch must be a non-decimal number

entry.value:
{"controlHints":[{"text":"Select a Rapid Application. The versions that you have permission to administer will appear in the drop down below.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C798_"},{"text":"Opens the highest live version of the application in a new browser window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1188_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Once you have selected an application you can choose the version here.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1061_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Opens the selected version in a new browser window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1189_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Open Rapid Design and load the selected Rapid application and version.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C796_"},{"text":"Create a new Rapid application.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C799_"},{"text":"Import a previously exported Rapid application version. ","style":"max-width:500px;","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C800_"},{"text":"Reload action definitions from their xml files","style":"max-width:500px;","controlId":"rapid_P0_C811_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Reload control definitions from their xml files","style":"max-width:500px;","controlId":"rapid_P0_C812_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Reload applications and rebuild resource files such as styling and JavaScript","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C813_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Reload security and connection adapters, including database drivers","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C814_","type":"hover"},{"text":"These are the users allowed to use the Rapid Admin and Rapid Design tools.
To administrate or design a specific application users will also need to be added to the security for that application and be given the RapidAdmin or RapidDesign roles. You are not able to delete yourself, or remove your admin privileges.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C906_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The actions available in Rapid Design for this application. Standard actions are added when the application is created.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1028_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The controls available in Rapid Design for this application. Standard controls are added when the application is created.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1030_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Rapid will backup the application files whenever changes are saved. Choose to delete a backup or restore from one, and specify the maximum number of backups to keep.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1031_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Rapid will backup the page files whenever changes are saved in Rapid Design. Choose to delete a backup or restore from one, and specify the maximum number of backups to keep for each page.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1032_","type":"hover"}]}

{"controlHints":[{"text":"The application name is used to uniquely identify the application and create its url and resources. Best to keep it short. Changing the name will change the url and rebuild all of the resources.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C801_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use this field to identify different versions of your application. This is especially useful for mobile and forms where you may need to process data from old versions. Changing the version will modify the url.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1079_","type":"hover"},{"text":"If the version is not specified in the url users will be shown the most recent live version of your application. This allows you to work on new versions without affecting current users. In mobile, making a new version live will prompt users to upgrade. You might need to process data from older versions of your application until they do. Forms saved at an older version can still be submitted. ","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1099_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The title is shown to users when they select the application from a list","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C802_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use the description to hold any further details about the application.
It is not shown to users.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C803_"},{"text":"If no page is specified in the url, this page will be shown.","style":"max-width:500px;","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C804_"},{"text":"For advanced users who might want to use JavaScript to manipulate controls directly. Shows the control id in the control properties.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C805_"},{"text":"For advanced users who might want to invoke an action from JavaScript. Shows the action id amongst the control properties.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C806_"},{"text":"Creates a new, empty, version of this application.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1162_"},{"text":"Creates a new version of the application by duplicating the selected version.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1168_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Deletes the current version of the application.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1174_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Exports the application version as a .zip file which is downloaded. This can be imported into other Rapid servers.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C808_"},{"text":"Deletes the application. Use with caution.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C810_"},{"text":"Save any global css style rules here. CSS classes will be available in the styles classes section in Rapid Design.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C911_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use parameters to store values used throughout your application.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1109_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Rapid will search for the parameter using the name. It is case-sensitive.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1119_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The value that Rapid will use when this parameter is retrieved.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1126_","type":"hover"}]}

{"controlHints":[{"text":"Database connections are used by actions and other Rapid features.
Any database with a jdbc driver can be used.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C998_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The connection name will appear in drop downs. 
Changing the name will not break any actions that use this database connection.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C912_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Choose the driver appropriate to your database. 
Additional drivers can be added by advanced users.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C913_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The JDBC connection string appropriate to the selected driver.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C914_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Connection adapters can provide advanced functionality when database connections are established. Such as connection pooling, and pass-through authentication.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C915_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The user name to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C916_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The password to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C917_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Tests the database connection and adapter. Returns either an error, or "Database connection ok".","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C919_","type":"hover"}]}

[{"text":"Database connections are used by actions and other Rapid features.
Any database with a jdbc driver can be used.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C998_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The connection name will appear in drop downs. 
Changing the name will not break any actions that use this database connection.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C912_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Choose the driver appropriate to your database. 
Additional drivers can be added by advanced users.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C913_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The JDBC connection string appropriate to the selected driver.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C914_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Connection adapters can provide advanced functionality when database connections are established. Such as connection pooling, and pass-through authentication.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C915_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The user name to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C916_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The password to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C917_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Tests the database connection and adapter. Returns either an error, or "Database connection ok".","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C919_","type":"hover"}]

{"controlHints":[{"text":"Webservices can be used by your Rapid application and external systems. 
They can be invoked in SOAP or JSON. 
Request messages are validated against the schema before processing.
Advanced users can add their own adapters for other types. 
","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1000_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the webservice is used as the operation/webmethod.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C930_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The database connection the SQL will be run against.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C931_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the request. 
This will be an XML element in SOAP, or an object in JSON. 
Add SOAP restrictions to create a detailed schema, these will be used to validate the request message and will appear in the .wsdl file.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C932_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The SQL statement run against the database connection. 
Use question marks to pass in request child element values in the order they are specified.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C933_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the response. 
This will be an XML element in SOAP, or an object in JSON. 
Add SOAP restrictions to create a detailed schema, these will appear in the .wsdl file.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C934_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Opens the webservice .wsdl file in a new window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C935_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the webservice is used as the operation/webmethod.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C947_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Advanced users can create Java classes that implement the RapidWebservice interface.
The class must be on your webservers classpath and its full name must appear here.

","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C955_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Tests the Java class can be loaded and opens the webservice .wsdl file in a new window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C982_","type":"hover"}]}

[{"text":"Webservices can be used by your Rapid application and external systems. 
They can be invoked in SOAP or JSON. 
Request messages are validated against the schema before processing.
Advanced users can add their own adapters for other types. 
","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1000_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the webservice is used as the operation/webmethod.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C930_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The database connection the SQL will be run against.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C931_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the request. 
This will be an XML element in SOAP, or an object in JSON. 
Add SOAP restrictions to create a detailed schema, these will be used to validate the request message and will appear in the .wsdl file.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C932_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The SQL statement run against the database connection. 
Use question marks to pass in request child element values in the order they are specified.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C933_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the response. 
This will be an XML element in SOAP, or an object in JSON. 
Add SOAP restrictions to create a detailed schema, these will appear in the .wsdl file.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C934_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Opens the webservice .wsdl file in a new window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C935_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the webservice is used as the operation/webmethod.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C947_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Advanced users can create Java classes that implement the RapidWebservice interface.
The class must be on your webservers classpath and its full name must appear here.

","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C955_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Tests the Java class can be loaded and opens the webservice .wsdl file in a new window.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C982_","type":"hover"}]

{"controlHints":[{"text":"By default Rapid security is stored in xml files. 
Advanced users can create security adapters that consult databases, or other systems such as active directory.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1002_"},{"text":"These are roles within the application. Click to edit the details. 
RapidAdmin and RapidDesign control whether users can administrate or design the application so can't be removed.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1004_"},{"text":"These are the users known to the application. 
Click to edit the details.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1006_"},{"text":"The short name of the role, used to uniquely identify it.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1010_"},{"text":"A longer description of the role.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1011_"},{"text":"The user name or login that uniquely identifies the user.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1019_"},{"text":"A longer description of the user. Typically their full name.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1020_"},{"text":"The password may be left blank depending on the security adapter.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1021_"},{"text":"These are the roles that this use has.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1024_"},{"text":"Add the role selected in the drop down to the user.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1025_"}]}

[{"text":"By default Rapid security is stored in xml files. 
Advanced users can create security adapters that consult databases, or other systems such as active directory.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1002_"},{"text":"These are roles within the application. Click to edit the details. 
RapidAdmin and RapidDesign control whether users can administrate or design the application so can't be removed.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1004_"},{"text":"These are the users known to the application. 
Click to edit the details.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1006_"},{"text":"The short name of the role, used to uniquely identify it.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1010_"},{"text":"A longer description of the role.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1011_"},{"text":"The user name or login that uniquely identifies the user.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1019_"},{"text":"A longer description of the user. Typically their full name.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1020_"},{"text":"The password may be left blank depending on the security adapter.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1021_"},{"text":"These are the roles that this use has.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1024_"},{"text":"Add the role selected in the drop down to the user.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1025_"}]

{"controlHints":[{"text":"The list of mobile or other devices for previewing your application in Rapid Design. 
"Desktop" cannot be deleted or modified. 
Please consult your device documentation for specific values. 
Best to enter values in portrait mode (width less than height). 
You can flip between portrait and landscape in Rapid Design.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1196_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the device. 
It will appear in the devices dropdown in the page properties in Rapid Design.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1260_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The width of the device's screen in pixels.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1261_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The height of the devices screen in pixels.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1262_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The number of pixels your device has in each square inch of it's screen. 
Also called "pixel density". Desktop screens usually have 96 pixels per square inch. 
Modern, high resolution, mobile phones have several hundred.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1263_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The degree to which the device scales the pixels. 
For example, if a 100 pixel long line on a desktop screen appears half the length on the device the scale is 2. 
This is most commonly found by trial and error.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1264_","type":"hover"}]}

[{"text":"The list of mobile or other devices for previewing your application in Rapid Design. 
"Desktop" cannot be deleted or modified. 
Please consult your device documentation for specific values. 
Best to enter values in portrait mode (width less than height). 
You can flip between portrait and landscape in Rapid Design.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1196_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The name of the device. 
It will appear in the devices dropdown in the page properties in Rapid Design.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1260_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The width of the device's screen in pixels.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1261_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The height of the devices screen in pixels.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1262_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The number of pixels your device has in each square inch of it's screen. 
Also called "pixel density". Desktop screens usually have 96 pixels per square inch. 
Modern, high resolution, mobile phones have several hundred.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1263_","type":"hover"},{"text":"The degree to which the device scales the pixels. 
For example, if a 100 pixel long line on a desktop screen appears half the length on the device the scale is 2. 
This is most commonly found by trial and error.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P0_C1264_","type":"hover"}]

page.description: This page is the Rapid Administration page
